string.text: This is a test string for knapsack
This is another test string for knapsack
The case documents. Made of refractory material.

Something like a powerful electronic lockpick. It looks like she was created to hack any specific electronic lock. Oddly enough the design does not imply universality - it was created for a specific lock and are not able to crack any other codes.
Plastic file with documents. Without a degree in biology, something difficult to understand.
A thick stack of scientific papers. Solid terms, formulas, and charts.
Worn manuscript in a leather cover. Written by the Shooter. Judging by the titles, it reveals some of the mysteries of the Zone.
Heavy wooden box, with the words "Explosive" in several languages.
The flash drive is a convenient device for transferring information.
The flash drive is a convenient device for transferring information.
The flash drive is a convenient device for transferring information.
The flash drive is a convenient device for transferring information.
E-the key to the underground lab X-18.
Pocket personal computer. An indispensable device in the Zone.
Pocket personal computer. An indispensable device in the Zone.
The case documents. Made of refractory material.
Untuned prototype developed by scientists to protect from PSI-radiation
Configured a prototype developed by scientists to protect from PSI-radiation
Is very popular among stalkers, as it takes little space and it easy to learn to play.
Simply an indispensable tool in the Area. Helps to while away the long evenings by the fire and good cheer.
